definitions.definition: Either of two small woodpeckers , Jynx torquilla and Jynx ruficollis , of the Old World , that turn their heads almost 180 degrees when foraging.
A twisted or distorted neck ; a deformity in which the neck is drawn to one side by a rigid contraction of one of the muscles .

main_definition: Either of two small woodpeckers , Jynx torquilla and Jynx ruficollis , of the Old World , that turn their heads almost 180 degrees when foraging.
secondary_definitions: ( medicine , dated ) A twisted or distorted neck ; a deformity in which the neck is drawn to one side by a rigid contraction of one of the muscles .
